name: Image
desc: A view that displays an image.

items.name: init(String, bundle: Bundle?)
items.desc: Creates a labeled image that you can use as content for controls.

items.name: init(String, bundle: Bundle?, label: Text)
items.desc: Creates a labeled image that you can use as content for controls, with the specified label.

items.name: init(CGImage, scale: CGFloat, orientation: Image.Orientation, label: Text)
items.desc: Creates a labeled image based on a Core Graphics image instance, usable as content for controls.

items.name: init(decorative: CGImage, scale: CGFloat, orientation: Image.Orientation)
items.desc: Creates an unlabeled, decorative image based on a Core Graphics image instance.

items.name: init(uiImage: UIImage)
items.desc: Creates a SwiftUI image from a UIKit image instance.

items.name: init(nsImage: NSImage)
items.desc: Creates a SwiftUI image from an AppKit image instance.

items.name: func resizable(capInsets: EdgeInsets, resizingMode: Image.ResizingMode) -> Image
items.desc: Sets the mode by which SwiftUI resizes an image to fit its space.

items.name: func antialiased(Bool) -> Image
items.desc: Specifies whether SwiftUI applies antialiasing when rendering the image.

items.name: func symbolRenderingMode(SymbolRenderingMode?) -> Image
items.desc: Sets the rendering mode for symbol images within this view.

items.name: func renderingMode(Image.TemplateRenderingMode?) -> Image
items.desc: Indicates whether SwiftUI renders an image as-is, or by using a different mode.

items.name: func interpolation(Image.Interpolation) -> Image
items.desc: Specifies the current level of quality for rendering an image that requires interpolation.

items.name: enum TemplateRenderingMode
items.desc: A type that indicates how SwiftUI renders images.

items.name: enum Interpolation
items.desc: The level of quality for rendering an image that requires interpolation, such as a scaled image.

items.name: static func == (Image, Image) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two images are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two images are unequal.
